CGridColumnEditor Class Reference

CGridColumnEditor specifies the interface for the column editor that can work together with CGridListCtrlEx. More...

Inherited by CGridColumnEditorProfile.

Detailed Description

CGridColumnEditor specifies the interface for the column editor that can work together with CGridListCtrlEx.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool CGridColumnEditor::HasColumnEditor ( CGridListCtrlEx &  owner,
int  nCol,
CString &  strTitle 
) [inline, virtual]

Is there a column configuration editor available for this column ?

Parameters:
owner The list control with the column
nCol The index of the column
strTitle Title to show in the context menu when right-clicking the column
Returns:
Column editor available (true / false)

CString &  strTitle 
) [inline, virtual]

Parameters:

strTitle Title to show in the context menu when right-clicking the column
Returns:
Column picker available (true / false)

CSimpleArray< CString > &  profiles,
CString &  strTitle 
) [inline, virtual]

Is it possible to switch between multiple column configurations ?

Parameters:
owner The list control with the columns
profiles List of available column profiles
strTitle Title to show in the context menu when right-clicking the column
Returns:
Name of the current column profile
